scripts.nvm: nodever=$(<.nvmrc) && node -v | grep -q "v$nodever" && echo "Correct node version" && npm i || exit 1
scripts.shell: npm run nvm && export development=true && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="$(pwd)/../service-account-staging.json" && firebase functions:shell
scripts.shell:production: source ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && export development=true && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="$(pwd)/../service-account-production.json" && firebase functions:shell
scripts.deploy:development: npm run nvm && npm i && firebase use development && firebase deploy --only functions && say 'Development deployment done'
scripts.deploy:production: npm run nvm && npm i && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions && say 'Production deployment done'
